fields.value: Data for Field CR, Dayer AA, Elphick CS. Landowner behavior can determine the success of conservation strategies for ecosystem migration under sea-level rise

dsDescriptionValue.value: This file contains the raw responses to the questionnaire used as the main source of data in: Field CR, Dayer AA, Elphick CS. Landowner behavior can determine the success of conservation strategies for ecosystem migration under sea-level rise.

files.description: This file contains comma separated values for landowner responses to a questionnaire about coastal flooding (see SI Appendix). There is a row for each respondent (n = 1002), referenced by an ID number (1-1002). Each column label references a question from the questionnaire (e.g. Q1 is question 1). Items are coded using numerals from left to right: Likert-scale items are recorded as 1 (strongly unlikely) to 5 (strongly likely); Yes/No items are recorded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No). The number 9 is used for blank responses.
files.label: Fieldetal_survey_responses_public_PNAS.tab

Items are coded using numerals from left to right: Likert-scale items are recorded as 1 (strongly unlikely) to 5 (strongly likely); Yes/No items are recorded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No). The number 9 is used for blank responses.
